Author: rail
Name: AetherDraw
Punchline: A realtime multi-user whiteboard raid planner. Compatible with aetherdraw.me
Description: Draw strategy plans for encounters. Use /aetherdraw to open. Supports realtime multi-user, multi-platform collaboration. Also available at aetherdraw.me when plugins are down!!
Changelog:
v2.3.1.0:Changed BG to image import, page sync fixes.
v2.3.0.5: Fixed live session synchronization issue that caused duplicate objects (ghosting).
v2.3.0.4: transform handle visible fix.
v2.3.0.3: API 13.
